privateJob.title: Replicon Representative Recruitment 2021 â€“ Apply Online for Various  Posts
privateJob.body:
Name of the post:

  • Business Development Representative

Description:

Replicon has issued a notification to fill the vacancies of various posts of Business Development Representative. If you are finding jobs in Bangalore then feel free to apply online from The ProGrad .The candidates who are interested in the vacancies issued by Replicon can see the detailed information about key skills required, educational qualification, total vacancies, how to apply, roles, and responsibilities are given below. Replicon is dealing with software products. If you are interested then read the details that are given below.

Total vacancies:

  • Various vacancies have released.

Selection Process:

  • Written Test
  • Group Discussion
  • Personal Interview

Role and responsibility:

  • Liaise and work with the field sales team to build and grow the sales pipeline of qualified opportunities to support their revenue targets and quota
  • Working closely with others on the Customer Success team and training them to prepare and present demonstrations for prospective clients.
  • Present the value proposition clearly and succinctly.
  • And various others. Check the apply now link to check more details

Educational qualification:

The candidates who are interested to apply for the Replicon job must have the following qualification:

  • The candidates must have completed the Graduation from a recognized university to apply for the application Replicon Representative Recruitment 2021

Key skills required :

The candidates who are interested to apply in these job openings must have the following key skills that are required to do this:

  • 2-3 years of proven success in the software industry using inbound and outbound prospecting as your primary success tools in a B2B sales environment in North America, EMEA or APJ
  • Strong communication skills, passionate for the role, good Customer success background.
  • Persuasive, persistent, and professional while communicating with prospects via phone and email
  • Check out the apply now link for more mentioned skills

Payscale info. :

  • The Payscale of Replicon Representative is around INR 80,000 per month.

The document needs to be carried:

The candidates who will be selected for the interview must carry the below-mentioned documents:

  • The first and foremost thing is your resume/CV which has your educational background and other related information.
  • You must have your Adhaar card for identity purposes.
  • You must have other identity proofs like a PAN card, voter id, or Passport to prove your citizenship.
  • At last, you should have photocopies of important educational certificates.

How to apply for Replicon Representative Recruitment 2021?

Candidates who are eligible and interested to apply for Replicon Job then you should follow the below steps to apply:

  • Note: You can also apply by clicking the apply now button shown above to apply directly from here
  • First of all, read the Replicon Representative Recruitment 2021 notification thoroughly on the official websitewww.replicon.com.
  • You should have an email id and a phone number for communication purposes.
  • Click on the apply now link for the post you want to apply for.
  • Fill in the required details and submit.
  • Pay the application fee asked for.
  • Finally submit and download the application form for future purposes.
